level.text: An application for registration or renewal of registration must be accompanied by a fee established pursuant to subsection (b) of this section.
The Mayor shall, by rule, establish reasonable fees for:
An application for registration based upon a certificate of registration or licensure issued by another State;
An application for renewal of registration; and
An application for renewal of registration based upon an application for renewal of registration or licensure submitted in another State.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-107
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 9 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
